summary: This mod added unique "standalone" female follower to the game. [HDT Required 18+]
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3][size=4]Midna[/size]

This mod added unique "standalone" female follower to the game. [HDT Required 18+]

Note:
She uses her own costume ebony armor, umbra sword, and targaryen shield.
Complete with her own perks extra carry weight and marriageable

Location:
Dead Man's Drink Falkreath

Required :
Skyrim.esm

[b][u]> > Required for HDT < <[/u][/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/?]XP32 Maximum Skeleton -XPMS by [b]xp32[/b][/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?]HDT Physics Extensions by [b]HydrogensaysHDT[/b][/url]

[b]Installation : [/b]
NMM or copy to data folder

[b]Uninstall : [/b]
Remove from NMM or Delete from data folder
[b]
Credit : [/b]
BETHESDA
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE- by [b]Caliente[/b][/url]
